  physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features two food stands. Behind these food stands is a large building. A couple of people can be seen sitting on the first level
 towards the left hand side of the photograph. There is an assortment of food items on display at the two food stands. The food stand to the left is unattended while the other one towards the right is being tended to by a man and a boy. A rickshaw can be seen on the extreme right hand side of the photograph.
